subject: Self Care
title: Sustainable Ambition
description: A quick win: understand Sustainable Ambition.

hook.text: Ambition without rest is a sprint toward collapse. Sustainable ambition is a marathon with built-in water stations.

buildup.text: Hustle culture glorifies exhaustion. But the most successful long-term performers are those who pace themselves.

discovery.text: Brad Stulberg calls it the growth equation: stress plus rest equals growth. Both are required. Neither alone suffices.

twist.text: Taking breaks isn't slowing down. It's building the foundation for the next push. Rest is part of the strategy.

climax.text: Set ambitious goals. Then design recovery into the pursuit. The destination matters, but so does arriving intact.

punchline.text: Ambitious and rested. That's the winning formula.

quiz.question: What is Brad Stulberg's growth equation?
